scoring_criteria.pain_score: Intensity of the problem. 10 = 'I am losing money/time rapidly'. 1 = 'Ideally would be nice to fix'.
scoring_criteria.urgency_score: Time sensitivity. 10 = 'Need fix today'. 1 = 'Can wait months'.
scoring_criteria.willingness_to_pay_score: Commercial intent. 10 = 'I will pay $100+ right now'. 1 = 'Searching for free tool only'.
